Add stops with the button above.\nFor each, either add individual routes, or all routes to a destination.

Here you can see forthcoming trips for this favourite. Each trip shows:
- The stop it departs from
- The destination
- The scheduled time of departure
- The number of minutes until departure.
- The estimated time of departure, when GPS data is available.

The short string above the number of minutes can be
‘Sched’ if the time is taken from the schedule,
‘Last’ if this is the last stop for the route, and thus you cannot board the bus here,
‘GPS’ if the time is an estimate based a GPS reading,
‘GPS?’ if there was a GPS reading, but it is more than a minute old, which is suspicious, and might indicate that the estimate is no longer good, or 
‘…’ when waiting for GPS data from the OCTranspo API.
